ActJudges Act
SubjectMegan Lawson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Donald M. Lawson Effective: August 21, 2009
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MEGAN LAWSON, widow of the Hon. Donald M. Lawson, a Justice of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), effective August 21, 2009.
